neurotools.models.rbm.rbm_sample module

neurotools.models.rbm.rbm_sample.conditional_map(k, v)[source]

Given two one-dimensional numpy arrays of the same length, containsing keys and values, return a dictionary mapping each key to the list of associated values.

newer versions of np.unique offer this functionality and are recommended if available.

class neurotools.models.rbm.rbm_sample.RBM_sample(S, W, Bh, Bv)[source]

Bases: object

precompute()[source]

Precompute useful values. Unique patterns in samples, visibles, and their hash values. Marginal probabilities from samepls.

Ahv(v)[source]

Activation of hiddens conditioned on visible pattern

Phv(v)[source]

Probability of hiddens conditioned on visible pattern

Avh(h)[source]

Activation of visibles conditioned on hidden pattern

Pvh(h)[source]

Probability of visibles conditioned on hidden pattern

Eh_unnormalized(h)[source]

Energy of hidden state, up to a constant. This constant depends on the joint model partition function (normalization constant) and is difficult to compute in general.

Ev_unnormalized(v)[source]

Energy of visible state, up to a constant. This constant depends on the joint model partition function (normalization constant) and is difficult to compute in general.

dEh(h)[source]

Relative energy of hidden state compared to lowest energy observed in sample

dEv(v)[source]

Relative energy of visible state compared to lowest energy observed in sample

property Hhv

Entropy of hiddens conditioned on visible pattern v

property barHhv

Conditional entropy H(h|v)

property Hvh

Entropy of visibles conditioned on hidden pattern v

property barHvh

Conditional entropy H(v|h)

property EUh_factorial

Theoretical energy of unique hidden patterns if it is the case that the hidden layer factorizes.

property dEUh

Relative energies for unique hidden patterns in sample, computed from model parameters.

property dEUv

Relative energies for unique visible patterns in sample, computed from model parameters.

property dEhhv_meanfield

Compute expected energy by calculating energy of expectation

property dEhhv

Relative energy of hiddens conditioned on unique observed visible patterns. Computed from visible samples using energies from model parameters.

property dEvvh

Relative energy of hiddens conditioned on unique observed visible patterns.

property Evvh
property Evh

Conditional energy of visible patterns in sample given corresponding hidden pattern

property Ehv

Conditional energy of hidden patterns in sample given corresponding visible pattern

property Evhhv_meanfield

Two-hop conditional energies, computed from mean-field visibles -> hiddens -> visibles

property Evhhv

Two-hop conditional energies, computed from sample visibles -> hiddens -> visibles

property Ehvvh_meanfield

Two-hop conditional energies, computed from mean-field hiddens -> visibles -> hiddens

property Ehvvh

Two-hop conditional energies, computed from sample hiddens -> visibles -> hiddens
